basics.name: Rachel Ouye
basics.label: HICFA Processing Laboratory Technician/Manager and Computer Science Student
basics.summary: I am pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science and expected to graduated in the Fall of 2024. My current profession is in the medical field where my work allows me to exhibit laboratory skills and practices. I hold a B.S. in Marine Biology in which I gained research experience and hope to utilize in my next career path.
